title: Scene 1 - generic title
where_when: its mid morning, and you are heading North to the marina
text: As you emerge from the path into the north end of town , you see an Near empty Marina. all the houses and shops along the waterfront have boarded  up thier doors, You can see people scurrying away wheelbarrows piled high others with baskets or bags loaded over thier shoulders, what the hell is going on , you say aloud to no one
exit_line: This line leads to the next scene.
